channel.title: Would Autorune be runnable in private servers?
channel.description: Im thinking maybe.Maybe the next version of moparscape(new deob 422) could be released with autorune? Just a question as autorune dosnt work anymore with real runescape

Yeah.Don’t forget we write our own codes,not copy them

item.title: Would Autorune be runnable in private servers?
item.dc:creator: @philip_l_g philip_l_g
item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

even if you did use it with rsc priv servers it wouldnt work because they have totally different packets then the actual game and AR picked up certain packets and edited it so no it wouldnt work on rsc or rs2 priv servers unless you re write it like mopar said…

Read full topic

item.title: Would Autorune be runnable in private servers?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:11, topic:8841”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=12578.msg142215#msg142215 date=1155231552]
you could easily convert autorune to run on rs2 private servers, but really why would you?
[/quote]

Easily? Other than the fact it would require rewriting all of the packet generation (the protocol is different, there are even different datatypes)[/quote]

I meant that you would only have to rewrite it once, because after that it would never update or change.

Read full topic
item.source: Would Autorune be runnable in private servers?

item.title: Would Autorune be runnable in private servers?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Easily? Other than the fact it would require rewriting all of the packet generation (the protocol is different, there are even different datatypes)

Maybe mopar meant just rewriting the scripting language/functions into RS2, without making it a packet-sending bot. Not that it’s going to happen anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: Would Autorune be runnable in private servers?

you could easily convert autorune to run on rs2 private servers, but really why would you?
